attributes.action: force the Inland Revenue to claim monies owed from Leeds Utd
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As we see Scarborough Football Club go out of business with a debt of 'just' £825,000 to the Inland Revenue, how can Leeds Utd Football Club manage to by-pass nearly £8 MILLION of money owed to us the Tax Payers.. I have to say i dont go to work to pay for a company who cant manage their business affairs correctly, when for example nurses, schools, hospitals nor OAP's could do with this extra funding. 
What makes matters worse the person who put the company in to admistration is allowed within 5 mins by the appointed company to re-buy the company without the debts...
If only it was that easy for the common person to lose a debt of £8 million in 5 minutes...
